QuestData.Title: Darkheart Thicket: Enter the Nightmare
QuestData.Description:
We could not save Ysera, but we did prevent her from destroying the temple.
Now I can finally turn my attention to my husband.
I do not know what fate he suffers now. I only know that if we stand any chance of saving him, you must go now.
Follow Xavius into the Nightmare and find Malfurion.
Please, save my husband if you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter Darkheart Thicket and Slay the Shade of Xavius.
QuestData.CompletionText: Is he alive? Will my husband return to me?
QuestData.RewardText: Praise Elune and all that her light touches... Malfurion is alive.$b$bI thought I would spend the rest of my days alone, dreaming of the choices I did not make.$b$bThank you. Thank you for returning my love to me.
